subject: Try an AI tool today
body: Ask an AI to generate three discussion questions for your next meeting. How do they compare to yours?

subject: Write your first prompt
body: Write a prompt asking AI to summarise something from your field. What did it get right? What did it miss?

subject: Where's the line?
body: A colleague submits a report mostly written by AI. Where's the line?

subject: Draft with AI
body: Draft one email you need to send today with AI assistance. Was it faster? Better?

subject: Share what you tried
body: What's one thing you tried with AI this week? Register it on the AI Exchange.
